name: Jumpy Racing
description:
Put your skills to the test in 90 seconds of INTENSE racing FUN! Tap, swipe, jump, and WIN!

• RACE against 20 other players in online multiplayer
• WIN trophies, earn coins, and unlock new content
• COLLECT 10+ cars featuring different styles and colors
• EXPLORE unique and challenging race tracks
